about_the_game:
The year is 1824. The Lagarde Psychiatric Hospital in France was famous not only for its brutal methods of "treatment" but also for its sinister legacy. Patients were subjected to inhuman torture: electrocution, drowning, isolation in dark rooms. Many were not destined to survive. Those who survived reported strange voices, mysterious figures, and a sense of the constant presence of something unearthly. Finally, the building was closed. But the vacant building quickly began to attract evil forces, Satanists and adrenaline seekers.

Now, almost two centuries later, you, a famous video blogger-skeptic, decide to take a desperate step - to go to the abandoned Lagarde Hospital to prove or disprove once and for all the rumors about its paranormal activity. Armed with only a camera and a flashlight, you head to this godforsaken place, ready to face its dark history head-on.

What awaits you in the dark corridors and empty chambers of Lagarde? Ghosts of tormented souls lurking in the shadows? Sinister rituals left behind by Satanists? Or something far more terrifying and inexplicable? Your goal is to survive and come out with proof. But remember, in this place the line between reality and horror is extremely thin. Will you be able to capture what lurks in the darkness, or will you become part of this terrifying legend yourself?
